verses.name: Deuteronomy 22:25
verses.text: But if a man find a betrothed damsel in the field, and the man force her, and lie with her: then the man only that lay with her shall die:

verses.name: Deuteronomy 22:26
verses.text: But unto the damsel thou shalt do nothing; there is in the damsel no sin worthy of death: for as when a man riseth against his neighbour, and slayeth him, even so is this matter:

verses.name: Deuteronomy 22:27
verses.text: For he found her in the field, and the betrothed damsel cried, and there was none to save her.
